content.rendered:
Tax Manager | Tulsa, OK Midtown Tulsa CPA firm seeking qualified Audit Manager for developing the division. CPA firm is renowned for its great work environment! Family values, flexibility and teamwork is held in the highest regards. The firm strives to create a culture of inclusion and team work, with open communication between all levels. In additional to the following technical skills, the agency is seeking candidates with a strong vision for their client as well as employer, with the ability to demonstrate business development experience and strong managerial skills. The position would include but not be limited to responsibilities for: tax compliance, tax planning, business consulting, project management and other client services.
  • Required:
    • Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting required.
    • Minimum of 5 years Public Accounting experience required.
    • CPA preferred
      Compensation will vary based on background and experience.
